# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="1a93c-102">Pasta a receber vazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1a93c-103">**Minha pasta a receber está vazia**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-103">**My inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="1a93c-104">Determinados suplementos no Firefox browser poderão impedir que a pasta a receber seja carregado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1a93c-105">Visite o suporte Firefox para obter informações sobre como [desactivar ou remover suplementos](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [Disable or remove Add-ons](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1a93c-106">**Pretende esvaziar a pasta a receber**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1a93c-107">Se pretende esvaziar a pasta a receber e elimine o correio electrónico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="1a93c-108">Seleccione o círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1a93c-109">seguinte para [a pasta a receber](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) na parte superior da lista de mensagens para seleccionar todas as mensagens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1a93c-110">Na parte superior da página, seleccione a **pasta vazia** (ou **Centrar-se vazia** / **Esvaziar outros** se direccionadas para a pasta a receber estiver activada).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1a93c-111">Seleccione **Eliminar tudo**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1a93c-112">Para remover todas as mensagens eliminadas, abra a [pasta Itens eliminados](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) e seleccione a **pasta vazia** > **Eliminar todas as**, em seguida, seleccione a **recuperar itens eliminados desta pasta** de mensagens em fila na parte superior da página e seleccione novamente a **pasta vazia** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1a93c-113">Para mais informações, consulte [eliminar correio electrónico no Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a93c-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
